com.jayway.restassured.module.mockmvc.response

Interface ValidatableMockMvcResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ValidatableResponseOptions<ValidatableMockMvcResponse,MockMvcResponse>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidatableMockMvcResponseImpl

    public interface ValidatableMockMvcResponse
extends ValidatableResponseOptions<ValidatableMockMvcResponse,MockMvcResponse>
    A validatable response of a request made by REST Assured Mock Mvc.

    Usage example: 

     get("/lotto").then().body("lotto.lottoId", is(5));

      Assert that a ResultMatcher matches the response.
